roleset.name: to handle clumsily
roleset.note: PAW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'paw' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from paw.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: prepositional Arg1
example.text: The hacker was pawing over the Berkeley files but also using Berkeley and other easily accessible computers as stepping stones to the network of computers used [*] by the military and national security agencies .
